snippet: With parliamentary elections looming, the prime minister and his cabinet step down amid a corruption scandal.
abstract: Egypt’s Prime Min Ibrahim Mehleb and his cabinet resigns amid corruption charges, shortly before country’s first parliamentary elections since 2013 military deposition of Islamist Pres Mohamed Morsi; Pres Abdel Fattah el-Sisi instructs Sherif Ismail to form new government within week; shakeup is latest blow for Sisi administration, already dealing with steady deterioration in Egypt's security and economy.
lead_paragraph: With parliamentary elections looming, the prime minister and his cabinet step down amid a corruption scandal.

headline.main: Premier Quits With Cabinet, Roiling Egypt
headline.print_headline: Premier Quits With Cabinet, Roiling Egypt
